txt.en: Talk to Lithuifin at the Eavespires

'Hoom-hom... the men dressed in wolf-skins are of no concern anymore, so says the silky-haired ones. I believe them, hoom. The trees of the mountain they are atop no longer call to me... they have returned to slumber.\n\n'The trees to the south, though, hom, scream out in agony. They call for help. Big men, giant men, nearly as tall as Longbough, hoom, rip the trees from the ground. I can feel their agony.'
'All of the preparations are ready. Now, we drive them off for good.'
'Men in green, Elf-folk, Men dressed as wolves, giant Men... there are nearly as many types of Man as there are trees.'
The giants camping on the western shores of the lake are new to Evendim.
The Elves have ideas on how to help ease Longbough's pain.
Lithuifin is at the Eavespires.\n\nLithuifin has a plan to drive off the giants for good.
